EmailTemplate.name: Email Template For deassociation of key Account
EmailTemplate.subject: The Account has been deassociated with the Key Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {recipient.name},
The Account {!Account.Name} has been deassociated with the Key Account {Account.Name}.
Please click on the following link to access on LinKreta, {!Account.Link} Note:- This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this mail.
